meta.label: Bundle Project and Push to Automation Node
meta.description: Bundle a project and migrate it from a design instance to an automation instance.

params.name: previous_bundles
params.label: Previously Used Bundle IDs
params.description: No selection required. Just showing you the previously used Bundle IDs for this project

params.name: bundle_id
params.label: Bundle id
params.description: Unique New Bundle ID (Cannot be one of the above)

params.name: remote_host
params.label: Destination Instance Address
params.description: Specify the location of the instance to copy the project to. (Required)

params.name: api_key
params.label: Remote API key
params.description: Specify the API key of the destination instance. (Required)

params.name: activate_scenarios
params.label: Activate Scenarios
params.description: If selected, all active scenarios on the initial project will be activated in the remote project.
